sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Some Russian mill bloggers claim that Russian forces are using fab air dropped bombs to destroy Ukrainian fortified areas in Bakhmut. The Institute for the Study of War's Current Control of Terrain estimate shows that Russian assessed advances and claimed territory amount to almost 88 percent of Bakhmut. Russian forces continued ground attacks in and around town. Milblogers claimed that Wagner Group forces made significant progress in urban areas in northwestern Bakhmut and have taken control of the area north of Vesela Street, including the territory of Bakhmut Hospital No. 2. The commander of the Ukrainian land forces, Oleksandr Syrski, stated that amid heavy fighting in the Donetsk-Region die Gegend auf dem Boden hält und die Enemies offensiv in Bakhmut hält.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
